mapper.delete: DELETE FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} AND order_status = 0
mapper.select: SELECT order_id AS orderId, user_id AS userId, total_amount AS totalAmount, payment_method AS paymentMethod, payment_status AS paymentStatus, order_status AS orderStatus, order_time AS orderTime, pay_time AS payTime, pay_num AS payNum, expire_time AS expireTime FROM orders ORDER BY order_status DESC, order_time DESC

SELECT o.order_id, o.user_id, oi.item_id, g.gid, g.title, g.price, oi.quantity, o.total_amount, o.payment_method, o.payment_status, o.pay_time, o.pay_num, o.order_status, o.order_time, o.expire_time FROM ( SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_id = #{orderId} ) o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid WHERE o.order_id = #{orderId}

SELECT DISTINCT o.order_id, o.user_id, oi.item_id, g.gid, g.title, g.price, g.stock, oi.quantity, o.total_amount, o.payment_method, o.payment_status, o.pay_time, o.pay_num, o.order_status, o.order_time, o.expire_time FROM orders o LEFT JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id LEFT JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE expire_time <= #{cutoffTime} AND order_status != 0;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders ( order_id, user_id, total_amount, order_time, payment_status, order_status, expire_time, payment_method ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{userId}, #{totalAmount}, #{orderTime}, #{paymentStatus}, #{orderStatus}, DATE_ADD(#{orderTime}, INTERVAL 24 HOUR), #{paymentMethod} )
INSERT INTO order_item (order_id, gid, title, quantity, price) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{gid}, #{title}, #{quantity}, #{price})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 1
SELECT SUM(total_amount) FROM orders WHERE payment_status = 1
SELECT oi.gid, g.title, g.price, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_sales, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.price) AS total_amount FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid GROUP BY oi.gid, g.title, g.price

SELECT oi.gid, g.title, g.price, SUM(oi.quantity) AS total_sales, SUM(oi.quantity * oi.price) AS total_amount FROM order_item oi LEFT JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid GROUP BY oi.gid, g.title, g.price ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT #{limit}
SELECT c.cname AS categoryName, SUM(oi.quantity * g.price) AS salesAmount FROM order_item oi JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid JOIN category c ON g.cid = c.cid GROUP BY c.cname ORDER BY salesAmount DESC

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') AS orderDate, SUM(oi.quantity * g.price) AS totalSales FROM orders o JOIN order_item oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN goods g ON oi.gid = g.gid GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY orderDate ASC;
